name: Rocket League: Revenge of the Battle-Cars
name_original: Rocket League: Revenge of the Battle-Cars
description:
Rocket League: Revenge of the Battle-Cars is a sports, racing and arcade game developed by Psyonix. It came out on 07-07-2015. It was published by Psyonix. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Rocket League: Revenge of the Battle-Cars is available on PC.
